channel.title: Drum Set
channel.description: Well i have been inspired to buy a drum set. I'm not sure what i should look for, but it needs to be rather cheap. Is it worth buying? Hard to pick up? Fun? What should i bee looking for? You know, all the usual questions.

item.title: Drum Set
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

I’d recommend a Pearl + Zildjian cymbal set. Yeah, it’s fun and you should pay for drum lessons if you decide to buy a drum set. Not too hard to pick up; just remember to practise a lot.

Read full topic
